subject: Tennis
organizations: United States Mens Clay Court Championship
lead_paragraph: Top-seeded James Blake beat eighth-seeded Oscar Hernandez of Spain, 6-3, 7-6 (3), to advance to the final of the United States Men’s Clay Court Championship in Houston. In his first ATP clay-court final, Blake will face seventh-seeded Marcel Granollers-Pujol of Spain, who beat unseeded Wayne Odesnik, 3-6, 7-5, 6-3.
